parameters.name: Cores
parameters.description: The number of vCPUs of the instance type. For more information, see [Instance families](~~25378~~).

parameters.name: GpuAmount
parameters.description: The number of GPUs that a GPU-accelerated instance has. For information about the valid values, see [GPU-accelerated compute optimized instance types](~~108496~~).

parameters.name: GpuSpec
parameters.description:
The GPU type. Valid values:

*   NVIDIA P4
*   NVIDIA T4
*   NVIDIA P100
*   NVIDIA V100
*   NVIDIA A100

This parameter is left empty by default, which indicates that all GPU types are queried. For more information, see [GPU-accelerated compute optimized instance types](~~108496~~).

parameters.name: InstanceFamilyLevel
parameters.description:
The level of the instance family. Valid values:

*   EntryLevel.
*   EnterpriseLevel.
*   CreditEntryLevel. For more information, see [Overview of burstable instances](~~59977~~).

This parameter is left empty by default, which indicates that instance families at all levels are queried.

parameters.name: InstanceTypeFamily
parameters.description: The instance family. For more information, see [Instance families](~~25378~~).

parameters.name: InstanceTypes
parameters.description: The instance types. You can specify up to 10 instance types.

parameters.name: Memory
parameters.description: The memory size of the instance type. Unit: GiB. For more information, see [Instance families](~~25378~~).

parameters.name: MinCores
parameters.description: The minimum number of vCPUs of the instance type. For more information, see [Instance families](~~25378~~).

parameters.name: MinMemory
parameters.description: The minimum memory size of the instance type. For more information, see [Instance families](~~25378~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description:
The zone ID.

This parameter is left empty by default, which indicates that all zones in the specified region are queried.
